Text:
It took me a lot of time to make this fully working so i share this for my friends and all other users in TPB because is really a pain in the ass to make this fully working xD

For those who dont know how to launch the game go to .minecraft/minecraft launcher/minecraft launcher.exe choose your username and click launch.

To change the language go to "opciones" and select "idioma". 

Dont forget to seed after download and enjoy this masterpiece!!
